es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.scenes
Class GeneralScene

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.scenes.GeneralScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Documented, HasId, Named, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cutscene, Scene
public abstract class GeneralScene
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Documented, Named, HasId

This class holds the data of a scene of any type in eAdventure.

          Documentation of the scene.
